message.body: Forwarded you the invite for this eve, but address is ###############. In fishtown
Ahh, I can't make it, I'm not in town. I ran away to Boston for the weekend. Sorry. Happy going away, and if I don't see you before you go, have a great trip!
Ahhh enjoy ####### Thanks for the well wishes. See you in may.
Thanks, it's crazy cold and snowy here! Don't do anything I wouldn't do!
I wouldn't know what those limits are so wish me luck.
Figuring that out is the fun part!
